availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William T. Scott (Lexington, Kentucky, trader and farmer)

body.p: Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, trader and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Scott. Trader in Lexington, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Lexington in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington, p. 426.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington, Ward 2, p. 240A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Fayette County, KY, June 1863, p. 39.
"William T. Scott (1833-1875)," Find A Grave, Memorial 60045140, accessed June 10, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/60045140.
